title: Donald Trump 'Intensified' Alien Interest, Set To Declassify UAP Data: Report
description: Report claims Donald Trump is ready to declassify secret UAP files if he returns to the White House, believing Americans have 'a right to know' about alien life.

title: Klopp ‘hovering like a UFO’ as two sources claim dramatic Liverpool return is ON after Slot sack
description: The Reds want Klopp back at Anfield in an interim role after sacking Slot, a report has claimed, though FSG have their eyes on a UCL winner as the long-term successor

title: Italian skies glow red again - UFO in sight? Photographer spots rare halo for second time in 3 years
